description: Assign a registered instance to a layer. Required Permissions: To use this action, an Identity and Access Management (IAM) user must have a Manage permissions level for the stack or an attached policy that explicitly grants permissions. For more information on user permissions, see Managing User Permissions.

parameters.name: LayerIds
parameters.description: The layer ID, which must correspond to a custom layer. You cannot assign a registered instance to a built-in layer. (string) ---
